name: Taytay Falls
description: A refreshing waterfall with cool, crystal-clear waters surrounded by lush forest, perfect for swimming and relaxing in nature.

name: Bukal (Kilangin) Falls
description: Known as a hidden paradise, this falls requires a scenic hike and rewards visitors with pristine waters and a peaceful escape.

name: Sprite Falls
description: A small but charming waterfall ideal for hikers seeking a less crowded spot close to Majayjay's forests.

name: Dalitiwan Stream / Resort
description: A nature-themed resort featuring streams, swimming spots, and gardens, perfect for family picnics and relaxation.

name: Minor Basilica of St. Gregory the Great (Majayjay Church)
description: A centuries-old Spanish colonial church, admired for its baroque architecture and cultural heritage.

name: Costales Nature Farm
description: The Philippines’ leading agri-tourism destination promoting organic farming and farm-to-table experiences.

name: Mount Banahaw–San Cristobal Protected Landscape
description: A sacred mountain with rich biodiversity, popular for trekking, spiritual pilgrimages, and eco-adventures.

name: APA Farms & Leisure
description: A leisure farm where guests can enjoy nature, interact with farm animals, and learn sustainable farming.

name: Resort River Front
description: A riverside escape offering fresh air, cool waters, and a laid-back atmosphere for weekend getaways.

name: AIDA AURORA NATURES FARM
description: A peaceful nature farm that promotes organic farming, with green surroundings ideal for relaxation.

name: La Triccias Resort Hotel Events and Restaurant
description: A resort and events venue with modern amenities and a restaurant that serves local and international cuisine.

name: Samkara Restaurant and Garden Resort
description: A rustic restaurant and resort surrounded by lush gardens, known for its traditional Filipino dishes.

name: Malinao Resort
description: A tranquil resort with access to natural streams and cottages for relaxation.

name: Valencia Transient House & Events Place
description: A budget-friendly lodging and events space for families and groups.

name: Bern's La Bistro
description: A cozy bistro offering comfort food and local favorites in the heart of Majayjay.

name: Jabella
description: A local eatery serving affordable and freshly prepared home-style meals.

name: D' Brews Delight
description: A small coffee shop perfect for quick caffeine fixes and casual meetups.

name: Arnoks Special Fried chicken
description: A popular local spot known for its crispy and flavorful fried chicken.

name: Daddy Mark
description: A casual dining place serving hearty meals at affordable prices.

name: Ceria's Kitchenette
description: A homestyle kitchenette with budget-friendly meals and a friendly neighborhood vibe.

name: A & G
description: A family-run restaurant offering Filipino favorites and snacks.

name: Bertos Place
description: A laid-back dining spot known for local comfort food and casual gatherings.

name: Ate Ganda's Kainan Lugaw Mami and more
description: A favorite local eatery for affordable lugaw, mami, and other comfort dishes.

name: Papa Mong's Kitchen
description: Serving local specialties and homemade-style meals in a welcoming setting.

name: Kusina ni Isa
description: A homey restaurant offering classic Filipino meals in generous portions.

name: RedDoorz @ Hilarion's Farm Majayjay Laguna
description: A budget-friendly lodging option surrounded by nature, perfect for overnight stays.

name: Mathew Amir Event Place
description: A scenic venue for gatherings and events with natural farm surroundings.

name: APA Wildlife Rescue and Conservation Park
description: A conservation site that houses rescued animals and promotes wildlife education.

name: Vin Fruit Soda
description: A quirky café offering refreshing fruit sodas and light snacks.

name: Sun and Moon Cafe + Bistro
description: A charming café with a mix of modern bistro meals and specialty drinks.

name: Cafe Aliana
description: A cozy coffee shop perfect for hangouts and casual study sessions.

name: Brew Very
description: A small café serving specialty coffee and pastries.

name: Teaspot Majayjay
description: A tea-focused café offering milk teas and light snacks.

name: Mokadrip
description: A modern café known for its hand-dripped coffee and quiet ambiance.

name: Scenic View Resort Hotel Bar & Restaurant
description: A full-service resort with panoramic views, hotel accommodations, and a restaurant-bar.

name: Puente del Capricho (Tulay Pige)
description: A historic stone bridge that showcases Spanish-era architecture, a favorite photo spot.

name: Nuestra Señora del Pilar Parish
description: A parish church serving as a spiritual and community hub in Majayjay.

name: BrewVery Suba
description: A cozy extension of Brew Very café offering coffee and snacks in Suba.

name: Rural Bites
description: A local restaurant serving home-style Filipino dishes with a rural charm.

name: Paradise FarmFresh (formerly TFF Pizza Paradise)
description: A farm-to-table restaurant formerly known for pizza, now serving fresh produce-inspired meals.

name: Mangulila Twin Falls
description: A pair of waterfalls offering a scenic escape for nature lovers and adventurers.

name: Carmela rose rest house
description: A quiet rest house ideal for small groups seeking peace and privacy near nature.

name: Taytay Falls VMDS LODGING HOUSE
description: An affordable lodging house near Taytay Falls, convenient for overnight travelers.

name: Sir Louie Lodging House
description: A budget lodging option with basic amenities close to Majayjay attractions.

name: Kyla's inn
description: A small inn providing budget-friendly accommodations for backpackers and groups.

name: SBH Amakan in Taytay Falls
description: Rustic amakan-style lodging for visitors who want a native and affordable stay.

name: SMALL BROTHER HOUSE IN TAYTAY FALLS
description: Simple and affordable lodging option close to Taytay Falls, perfect for hikers.
